attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the fashion for fast bowling during the 1980s and the canonisation of fast bowling cricketing heroes like Denis Lillee and Fred Trueman, the undeniable fact remains that 'spin works'.  Aside from the obvious examples of Shane Warne, Derek Underwood, one only has to think of the magic of John 'Charlie' Childs or Paul Flack.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
